description: 跨平台通用内容创作规则库（适用于微信、X、小红书、抖音等）

rules.pattern: 罗马数字章节编号系统
rules.description: 使用罗马数字(I-VII)为长文章节编号，营造学术感和权威感，同时清晰标记阅读进度
examples: I – The 3 ingredients of individual success & the death of the expert
II – You are living through the second renaissance
VII – Systems are the new product

rules.pattern: 预告式开篇（7个核心观点）
rules.description: 在开头明确告知读者将获得的价值数量（如7个观点），设定期待并承诺完整旅程
examples: Here are 7 of the most compelling ideas I could come up with
We have a lot to talk about, so I hope you're here for the ride
接下来我将分享5个改变我人生的认知

rules.pattern: 渐进式价值递进（理论→实践→系统）
rules.description: 从理论认知(I-II)到实践方法(III-VI)再到系统构建(VII)，形成完整学习路径
examples: 第1-2章：为什么（认知层）→ 第3-6章：怎么做（方法层）→ 第7章：系统化（整合层）
先讲道理 → 再教方法 → 最后给系统

rules.pattern: 历史类比法（文艺复兴/工业革命）
rules.description: 将当前趋势与重大历史事件类比，赋予话题历史纵深感和必然性
examples: We're going through a second renaissance（第二次文艺复兴）
The printing press was the catalyst（印刷术类比互联网）
We don't live in the Industrial Age anymore（工业时代对比）

rules.pattern: 名人密集引用（达芬奇/亚当·斯密/安·兰德）
rules.description: 每个章节引用不同领域名人观点，建立跨学科权威感
examples: Adam Smith: 'The man whose whole life is spent...'
Leonardo da Vinci: 'Study the science of art...'
Ayn Rand: 'The truly selfish person...'
Jordan Peterson案例分析

rules.description: 使用精确数字增强可信度（不是泛泛而谈）
examples: one worker could make 20 pins a day vs 48,000 pins
Within 50 years, 20 million books flooded Europe
3-6 months of following you
3-5 sources of information

rules.pattern: 中场休息式互动（邮件订阅插入）
rules.description: 在长文中段（第II章后）插入轻量级互动，既不打断阅读又能转化订阅
examples: If you enjoy these letters, I send them out 1-2x a week. Join here...
看到这里，如果觉得有用，可以关注我的公众号...
读到这里累了吗？先收藏，我们继续...

rules.description: 在文中自然插入相关文章链接，构建内容生态而非单篇孤岛
examples: This article on the content ecosystem may help
I have an entire guide on creating your first product here
可以参考我之前写的《XXX》
详细方法见我的另一篇文章

rules.description: 在长文中提醒读者进度和剩余内容，营造作者陪伴感
examples: Okay, this is getting long so I'm going to speed things up
We have a lot to talk about, so I hope you're here for the ride
That's it for this letter. Thank you for reading.
文章有点长，但相信你能坚持看完

rules.description: 将复杂概念提炼为3个相互关联的核心要素，形成闭环系统
examples: Self-education, self-interest, self-sufficiency（三者互相促进）
Brand, Content, Product（个人品牌三支柱）
Pursue goals → Teach what you learn → Help others（发展路径）

rules.description: 挑战主流观点，提供反直觉的新视角
examples: Society made you think multiple interests was a weakness（颠覆专业化）
Don't be a content creator... Be you（颠覆身份定位）
Shiny object syndrome has been trying to tell you（重新定义缺点）
Self-interest isn't selfish（重新定义自私）

rules.description: 提供两条路径对比，明确指出推荐路径及原因
examples: Path 1) Skill-Based（传统路径+局限）vs Path 2) Development-Based（推荐路径+优势）
传统方法：XXX（问题）vs 我的方法：YYY（优势）

rules.description: 对关键概念给出独特定义，建立专属话语体系
examples: Brand is an environment where people come to transform
Content is novel perspectives
Systems are the new product
Attention is one of the last moats

rules.description: 将抽象建议拆解为具体可执行的步骤
examples: Step 1) Build an idea museum → Step 2) Curate based on idea density → Step 3) Write 1 idea 1000 different ways
First, break down 3 ideas → Second, rewrite 3 ideas with different structures

rules.description: 提供具体工具推荐和可复制的AI提示词
examples: You can use Eden, Apple Notes, Notion...
Try this prompt: 'Do a comprehensive analysis on this social post...'
I'd recommend Claude as the model to use

rules.description: 详细拆解作者自己的系统（如2HW产品），展示从问题到解决方案的完整过程
examples: 2 Hour Writer系统：问题识别 → 实验过程 → 系统形成 → 产品化
Newsletter-centric系统：写作 → 跨平台 → 转化 → 闭环

rules.description: 使用加粗强调关键概念，斜体强调核心动词或转折词
examples: The missing piece was a *vessel*
A vessel that would allow me to *channel* all of my interests
**Three ingredients**: Self-education, self-interest, self-sufficiency
*You need to become a creator.*

rules.description: 开篇分享作者自己的困境和迷茫，建立'我也曾是你'的共鸣
examples: I was stuck in tutorial hell... I felt like I was just falling behind
I tried so many different things in college... but had to get the best job I could find
我也曾经迷茫过... 直到我发现了...

rules.description: 预判读者疑虑并直接回应，营造对话感
examples: Now, before you cringe and leave, I don't exactly mean...
But how do you actually start building it?
你可能会问... 我的回答是...
我知道你在想什么...

rules.description: 对文章本身进行评论，展示创作思路和决策过程
examples: I'll try to make this as logical as I can
Okay, this is getting long so I'm going to speed things up
I don't want to be redundant
这部分可能有点抽象，我尽量讲清楚
